mapper.select: SELECT sc.sno AS sno, student.name AS sname, content.contentID AS contentID, content.submitTime AS submitTime, content.score AS score, content.fileName AS fileName (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM similarity WHERE contentID1 = content.contentID OR contentID2 = content.contentID) AS similarAmount FROM sc JOIN student ON sc.sno = student.id JOIN homework ON sc.cno = homework.cno LEFT JOIN content ON homework.homeworkID = content.homeworkID AND sc.sno = content.sno WHERE homework.homeworkID = #{homeworkID} AND student.exist = 1;

SELECT c.contentID, c.fileName as fileName, COALESCE(score.score, null) as score, COALESCE(score.content, 'No comment') as comment FROM content c LEFT JOIN score ON c.contentID = score.contentID WHERE c.contentID = #{contentID} AND score.sno = #{sno}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN score >= 0 AND 2 > score THEN 1 END) as score_0_2, COUNT(CASE WHEN score >= 2 AND 4 > score THEN 1 END) as score_2_4, COUNT(CASE WHEN score >= 4 AND 6 > score THEN 1 END) as score_4_6, COUNT(CASE WHEN score >= 6 AND 8 > score THEN 1 END) as score_6_8, COUNT(CASE WHEN score >= 8 AND 10 >= score THEN 1 END) as score_8_10 FROM content WHERE homeworkID = #{homeworkID};

SELECT sc.sno AS sno, COALESCE(content.score, 0) AS score FROM sc JOIN homework ON sc.cno = homework.cno LEFT JOIN content ON homework.homeworkID = content.homeworkID AND sc.sno = content.sno WHERE homework.homeworkID = #{homeworkID};
